short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get tweet replies effortlessly with my assistance! Share a tweet, and I'll craft a response for you. GPT Plus subscription needed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reply2Tweets is an innovative Chrome extension designed to enhance your Twitter experience by integrating AI-powered responses. When browsing tweets, you'll notice an added 'reply w/ai' button which allows you to generate smart, context-aware replies using OpenAI's technology. This tool is perfect for those who want to engage more interactively on Twitter with creative and intelligent responses.

Note: A GPT Plus subscription is required to access the full features of this extension.

Features:
Adds a 'reply w/ai' button to tweets on Twitter.
Utilizes OpenAI's GPT technology to generate replies.
Easy to use with a simple click to generate and post replies.
Customizable button styling for a seamless integration with Twitter's interface.

Usage:
Navigate to Twitter.
Browse through tweets as usual.
Click the 'reply w/ai' button added to each tweet to generate and view suggested replies.
The generated reply will open in a new tab on the OpenAI chat interface, where you can edit or directly use it as your response.

Acknowledgements:
This extension uses OpenAI's GPT technology.
